titles.title: Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Technical Corrections Act
Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Technical Corrections Act
A bill to redesignate the Salem Maritime National Historic Site as the "Salem Maritime National Historic Park", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Technical Corrections Act
This bill redesignates the Salem Maritime National Historic Site in Salem, MA, as the Salem Maritime National Historical Park.
The bill authorizes the Department of the Interior to acquire an interest in the city of Salem for use as a visitor center and curatorial facility (currently, only authorized as a visitor center).
